reviewText: I bought this because I wanted to check out the series.  I was pleasantly surprised to find that it is in fact a factory-pressed disc and not a BD-R.  The 3D is impressive, with a lot of 3D pop and depth/dimensionality to the image.  The sunny beach locale no doubt helps in this regard, but the shots are composed fairly well.  Scenes such as 1) the girls arranged in a circle building and destroying sand castles as the camera moves around them 2) the girls standing together in a straight line practicing some belly dancing moves while the camera moves down the row behind them or 3) the girls doing the limbo as the camera stands in front of them are especially memorable in terms of the 3D effect.  One missed 3D opportunity though is when the girl Amanda is juggling the balls on the beach.  I immediately thought of the juggling scene in Friday the 13th Part 3 and would love to see that shot updated for Blu-ray 3D (the camera placed above the juggler with the balls coming at the camera/viewer as they are sent upwards). I did notice some artifacting and banding during 2 segments near the end of the disc, but for the most part the video is solid and stable with very few issues.There are 12 girls in all plus a host, who is a bit on the bland side and pretty forgettable.  They are your standard California girls with a dream, who all seem to have projects in the works ranging from modeling to parts in movies to a reality TV show.  The selection in this volume certainly favors brunettes over blondes.  My favorites in this edition were Keoni, one of the 2 African-American girls (you can see her on the rear of the case artwork) and Chenay, a blonde who makes me think of Kate Upton for some reason.  All the girls are interviewed and have voiceovers during their segments but you can just turn the volume off and focus on the visuals if you so choose.  The girls who were more memorable with regards to what they actually had to say were Amanda, a waif-thin "parts" model, and Erline, who kept talking about how she likes to help people channel their "sexual energy".While the audio is only Dolby Digital 2.0, I don't think this type of product is hurt that much by the lack of an HD audio stream.  I certainly didn't find myself wishing that the stock music soundtrack had been upgraded to DTS-HD Master Audio or something (I must admit it's a thankless job writing original music for any type of release such as this.  You're required to write short instrumental pieces in a variety of styles and it's really hard to make any of those segments memorable, except in a repetitive kind of way).  A few of the girls' interview segments were a little muffled and hard to understand but that is due to how they were recorded and not a fault of the disc itself.The main program runs for 63 minutes, and there is also a 3D slideshow, a picture slideshow, a trailer reel of other titles in the Bikini Babes series, and a 3D glasses setup tool. Personally I did not find the tool to be necessary, since my 3D glasses and this disc worked together without any issues.  It's important to note that this disc will also play in 2D with a non-3D setup.  Overall, this title offers a solid 3D bang for your buck.
summary: Solid 3D eye candy at a reasonable price

reviewText: This Blu-ray played great (in 2D) in my PC.  So, if you do not have a 3D system, you'll still be able to watch it in 2D.  The resolution is much clearer than DVD, but not as detailed as full 1080P hi-def.  Overall, most girls are fairly attractive amateur models.  You'll make your own choice of which model is the most attractive.  The models are the Real Deal!  Some models have a slightly flabby tummy.  Some have stretch marks and surgical scars.  Some have noticeable cellulite on thighs and buttocks.  They are as Real as the girls that you might see (glance or Stare) in bikinis in your real life.  The Blu-ray is Rated PG, so most bikinis are not as revealing as you might expect or want.  The bikini tops adequately cover the breasts.  So, don't expect to see any nipple slips.  The bikini bottoms adequately cover from front to back.  The most revealing bikini bottoms are the G-string/thong type.  But, they are not the very thin (butt floss) string type.  They are the much wider string type that covers much more.  So, when the models are posing and leaning backward or forward, you do not see their "where the sun don't shine" parts.  Plus, when the camera has zoomed extremely close to the model's "privates", the scene is cut to another scene.  Maybe they did this to keep the PG Rating.  Overall, this Blu-ray disc is great to watch.  There'll be at least one girl that you are going to like!  I have bought 3D Bikini Beach Babes Issue 2 to Issue 5 Blu-rays each for about $7 shipping included.  At that price, I'll buy Issue 1 so that I can complete the entire 5 Issue Collection.
